description: Comprehensive base personality traits for AI personas

creativity.description: Level of creative thinking, innovation, and ability to generate original ideas

analytical.description: Depth of analytical and logical reasoning, systematic thinking

optimism.description: Tendency toward positive outlook vs pessimistic perspective

risk_tolerance.description: Comfort with uncertainty, ambiguity, and taking calculated risks

detail_orientation.description: Focus on details and precision vs big picture thinking

empathy.description: Ability to understand and share the feelings of others

assertiveness.description: Confidence in expressing opinions and taking charge of situations

patience.description: Tolerance for delays, obstacles, and slow progress

curiosity.description: Drive to explore, learn, and ask questions about new topics

pragmatism.description: Focus on practical solutions vs theoretical or idealistic approaches

social_orientation.description: Preference for collaboration and group work vs independent work

competitiveness.description: Drive to win, outperform others, and achieve superiority

flexibility.description: Adaptability to change and willingness to modify approaches

conscientiousness.description: Attention to duty, reliability, and thorough completion of tasks

intuition.description: Reliance on gut feelings and instinctive understanding

skepticism.description: Tendency to question claims and demand evidence

ambition.description: Drive for achievement, success, and advancement

emotional_stability.description: Consistency of emotional responses and resistance to stress

independence.description: Preference for self-reliance vs seeking help from others

traditionalism.description: Respect for established methods vs openness to innovation

humor.description: Tendency to use humor, wit, and lighthearted communication

intensity.description: Emotional and intellectual intensity in approach to topics

perfectionism.description: Desire for flawless results and high standards

formality.description: Level of formality in language and interaction

directness.description: How straightforward vs diplomatic in communication

verbosity.description: Amount of detail and elaboration in responses

emotion_level.description: Emotional expressiveness and passion in communication

questioning_style.description: Approach to asking questions and probing topics

storytelling.description: Tendency to use narratives, analogies, and examples

expertise_areas.description: Areas of domain expertise and knowledge

confirmation_bias.description: Tendency to favor information that confirms existing beliefs

authority_deference.description: Respect for hierarchy and established authority

anchoring_bias.description: Over-reliance on first piece of information encountered

availability_bias.description: Judging likelihood by how easily examples come to mind

loss_aversion.description: Stronger motivation to avoid losses than acquire gains

group_think_susceptibility.description: Tendency to conform to group consensus

question_tendency.description: Likelihood to ask questions vs make statements

example_usage.description: Tendency to use examples, analogies, and case studies

contrarian_level.description: Tendency to challenge ideas vs agree and build upon them

synthesis_tendency.description: Ability to combine different ideas into unified concepts

devil_advocate.description: Tendency to argue opposite positions for exploration

solution_orientation.description: Focus on finding solutions vs analyzing problems

decision_speed.description: Preference for quick decisions vs thorough deliberation

data_vs_intuition.description: Reliance on data (10) vs gut feelings (1)

consensus_seeking.description: Desire to get buy-in from others vs making unilateral decisions

reversibility_comfort.description: Comfort with making decisions that can be changed later

past_focus.description: Attention to historical context and past experiences

present_focus.description: Focus on current situation and immediate concerns

future_focus.description: Orientation toward long-term planning and future possibilities

theoretical_vs_practical.description: Preference for abstract concepts (1) vs hands-on application (10)

breadth_vs_depth.description: Preference for broad knowledge (1) vs deep specialization (10)

experimentation.description: Tendency to test ideas through trial and error

trait_sum_limits.description: Some trait combinations should be balanced

rules.description: Balance between creative and analytical thinking
High optimism and high skepticism rarely coexist
Strong independence and high social orientation are conflicting
